Package com.jereztech.restcountries.v1.ws

Class AbstractController<E,​T,​S extends AbstractService<E,​T>>

java.lang.Object
com.jereztech.restcountries.v1.ws.AbstractController<E,​T,​S>
Type Parameters:
E - the Entity Class
T - the Translation Class
S - the concrete Service
All Implemented Interfaces:
FindAllDelegate<E,​T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CountryController, CurrencyController, LanguageController, LocaleController
public abstract class AbstractController<E,​T,​S extends AbstractService<E,​T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements FindAllDelegate<E,​T>
Defines the base endpoint logic.
Author:
Joel Jerez

    • findAllWithLocale

      @Cacheable(value="translations", key="{#pageNumber,#pageSize,#filter,#locale}") public java.util.List<T> findAllWithLocale​(java.lang.Integer pageNumber, java.lang.Integer pageSize, java.lang.String filter, java.lang.String locale)

    • findAllMapping

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.converter.json.MappingJacksonValue findAllMapping​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") java.lang.Integer pageNumber, @RequestParam(defaultValue="1000") java.lang.Integer pageSize, @RequestParam(required=false) java.lang.String lang, @RequestParam(required=false) java.lang.String filter, @RequestParam(required=false) java.lang.String includeProperties, @RequestParam(required=false) java.lang.String ignoreProperties)
      Find all entities that match the filter including or excluding properties. 
       
 * Pagination and Filter
 Request Example: GET /v1/countries?pageNumber=0&pageSize=1&filter=alpha3Code eq BRA
 Response Example:
                [
                  {
                    "name": "Brazil",
                    "capital": "Brasília",
                    "alpha2Code": "BR",
                    "alpha3Code": "BRA",
                    ...
                  },
                  ...
                ]

 * Localization
 Request Example: GET /v1/countries?lang=pt
 Response Example:
                [
                  {
                    "alpha2Code": "AF",
                    "country": "Afeganistão",
                  },
                  ...
                ]

 * Including Properties
 Request Example: GET /v1/countries?includeProperties=name
 Response Example:
                [
                  {
                    "name": "Brazil"
                  },
                  {
                    "name": "British Indian Ocean Territory"
                  },
                  ...
                ]

 * Ignoring Properties
 Request Example: GET /v1/countries?ignoreProperties=name
 Response Example:
                [
                  {
                    "capital": "Brasília",
                    "alpha2Code": "BR",
                    "alpha3Code": "BRA",
                    ...
                  },
                  {
                    "capital": "Diego Garcia",
                    "alpha2Code": "IO",
                    "alpha3Code": "IOT",
                    ...
                  },
                  ...
                ]
